abstract: Relatives of Nazish Noorani and Kashif Parvaiz, fighting for custody of the couple's two young boys, will share the children under a temporary agreement; Noorani, their mother,  was killed in a shooting in Boonton, NJ, that authorities say was arranged by her husband, Parvaiz, and a female associate.
snippet: Under the temporary agreement, relatives of both Nazish Noorani and Kashif Parvaiz, who is charged with murdering her, will share their two children.
lead_paragraph: Under the temporary agreement, relatives of both Nazish Noorani and Kashif Parvaiz, who is charged with murdering her, will share their two children.

headline.main: Custody Deal for 2 Families After Killing
headline.print_headline: Custody Deal For 2 Families After Killing
headline.seo: After Wife-Killing Charge, 2 Families Share Custody
